item.title: Oil heads for first weekly loss in 5 weeks
item.description: Oil futures inched lower in Friday trading, looking to post their first weekly loss in 5 weeks, as recent comments from President Donald Trump suggest...

item.title: You Can Own Elon Musk's SpaceX. But at What Price?
item.description: An ETF that can trade all day is investing in an asset that rarely changes hands. Figuring out what it’s worth is a guessing game.

item.title: Why 2024 was arguably the toughest year for home buyers and sellers in 30 years
item.description: Existing-home sales in 2024 fell to the lowest level since 1995, Realtors say.

item.title: Gold Futures Near All-Time High on Softer U.S. Dollar
item.description: Gold futures rose to near-record highs as the U.S. dollar rally faded.

item.title: Space industry IPOs ramp up as sector shapes up for a busy 2025
item.description: Fortuna Investments CEO Justus Parmar expects to see “a new vintage of space companies that hit the market” in 2025
